name: Planet India India Pvt Ltd
overview:
PLANET INDIA TRAVELS started as the brainchild of our Managing Director, Rajesh Mudgill, a post graduate in management studies from the University of Delhi. He has over two decades of rich and varied experience in travel management and tourism behind him. As a professional par excellence, he is credited with saving the corporate giant Abercrombie & Kent in the mid 1990’s from total crisis. He revived their operations in India from scratch. Rajesh Mudgill is widely acknowledged today as one of leading persons responsible for promoting the tourism industry in India.

At PLANET INDIA TRAVELS, we are proud to be amongst the few travel companies which respect all facets of the ecological sensitivities of our times. Our assets include our in-house infrastructure, knowledge, experience, network and logistic support. Also, our intuitive understanding of the wants, needs and desires of the discerning traveler help us to serve you better. We assure you, with confidence, that in matter of excellence in quality and service, we envy no one!

Based on our collective fields of specialization and experience, we cater mainly to three types of travelers- viz., the inbound traveler( visitors to destinations in India, Nepal, Tibet, Bhutan and Sri Lanka ), the corporate traveler (both visitors to India, Nepal, Tibet, Bhutan and Sri Lanka as well as corporate traveler from the Indian subcontinent who desire to travel to Malaysia, Singapore, Thailand, Hong Kong and other parts of South East Asia, destinations in Australia, Europe and America) and travelers from schools and other educational institutions ( both inbound as well as domestic).

milestones.description: Planet India believes in operating environment-friendly tours and travel.
